notes.text: Very strong deck -not only for ladder. 37:3 run from plat1 to KoG. Lost vs Yolo Hazy Firefist godhand and twice versus SSA without SRH in Hand. Mind Scan for the better Mirror Matchup and general control play. 22 Cards to fit 2 Floodgates in as kind of a surprise factor and higher versatility for the deck. I almost always set 1 monster and 1 backrow turn 1 to fake sylvans/aliens and even if you brick set your cards, most people will play patiently and if you draw eventually your fish, you will control the matchup via mind scan from there on. Playing passively will win most of the matches via WoD and MW, Swamp Mirrorer and PRs are for the OTK potential.
